messages.message: Do you automate your first message?

No, manually through linked in interface.
But do copy/paste the text :)
Ha! LinkedIn already types some generic responses it might at well press send. I am thinking to make a service out of scaled social networking.

I am combining linkedin with mautic
if you want a walk through let me know

My current process:
- LinkedIn - Connect (manual)
- Export to Mautic (manual)
- 1st email (automated)
- If email response is received, reply (manual)
Nice. My process could do the first three auto, but it isn't ready yet.
There is a google extension that automates all kinds of stuff, might be useful for you to look at it. I have not tried it.
Yeah, I use the Remote control for chrome so it can be controlled via Web-driver script.
https://github.com/megamindbrian/bots
Thanks - looks really useful
Its a docker with a virtual desktop and chrome in one container and a selenium crawler in another container. Not really useful, but a good programming exercise, could be used for QA.
I'm trying to find a newbie to work on it.

I was referring to the possible use cases.
Why do you need a newbie, just wave your wand :)
Haha, it's like the Apprentice from Fantasia.
Hey if you are nearby perhaps we can grab lunch or coffee sometime.
Scottsdale AZ
I'd like to. I am meeting the wifey at via Linda and Hayden near zipps
*via de Ventura
today - tomorrow are not good for me. Next week is pretty open
Next week should be better.
